message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10,500. This is a fair compromise considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counter with $9,750. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your willingness to compromise, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as high as $9,750. I'm willing to give a bit more, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm willing to offer it to you for $10,200. This is my final compromise.
I appreciate your final compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9,900, but no higher. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your willingness to go up to $9,900, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product at that price. I'm willing to give you a small concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm willing to offer it to you for $10,150. This is my final compromise.

I appreciate your final compromise, but I'm still not comfortable going above $9,900. I'm willing to make a small concession and meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counter with $9,850. This is my final offer.

I understand that you're not willing to go above $9,900, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product at $9,850. I'm willing to give you one last chance to meet me in the middle. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9,925. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still not comfortable going above my original budget. I'm going to have to pass on this opportunity and explore other options. I appreciate your time and effort, but I think I'll have to look elsewhere.
